name: cookhouse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small building used for cooking, for example when camping or in the army: They will live in typical basic accommodation, and eat their meals in the cookhouse. Then we went to the cookhouse to have dinner.
More examplesFewer examplesThe soldiers marched to the cookhouse for breakfast before returning to prepare for the first parade.We got back to camp too late for dinner, but managed to get some hot beans at the cookhouse.A cookhouse was provided for each ten tents.
